text: Lawrence P. "Laurie" Reis (November 20, 1858 in Chicago, Illinois – January 24, 1921 in Chicago, Illinois) was a 19th-century pitcher in Major League Baseball. ==Sources== Category:1858 births Category:1921 deaths Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Baseball players from Illinois Category:Chicago White Stockings players Category:19th-century baseball players Category:Sportspeople from Chicago Category:Dubuque Red Stockings players
title: Laurie Reis
